channel.title: Alt-Tab Replacement (and other microsoft power toys (thier name not mine))
channel.description:
Alt-Tab Replacement [img]http://www.lifehacker.com/assets/resources/2006/09/altab.png[/img]
http://download.microsoft.com/download/whistler/Install/2/WXP/EN-US/TaskswitchPowertoySetup.exe
Get a bunch of other random programs here: http://www.microsoft.com/windowsxp/downloads/powertoys/xppowertoys.mspx

item.title: Alt-Tab Replacement (and other microsoft power toys (thier name not mine))
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“Martin, post:7, topic:132265”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=183236.msg1667002#msg1667002 date=1186863765]

you can change that in taskbar properties. Im pretty sure the option is ‘group like’ or something. Power toys are always nice, but i dont like things layering over windows, i awlays know it is there, thinking it will affect performance

I don’t think TweakUI is a layer over Windows, I think it just allows you to access system variables that you couldn’t access through a GUI.
[/quote]

You mean Registry Edits :)[/quote]
It makes a nice UI for editing those secret registry edits (and you cant break your registry!)

Read full topic

you can change that in taskbar properties. Im pretty sure the option is ‘group like’ or something. Power toys are always nice, but i dont like things layering over windows, i awlays know it is there, thinking it will affect performance
[/quote]

I don’t think TweakUI is a layer over Windows, I think it just allows you to access system variables that you couldn’t access through a GUI.[/quote]

You mean Registry Edits

item.title: Alt-Tab Replacement (and other microsoft power toys (thier name not mine))
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

sup000:

you can change that in taskbar properties. Im pretty sure the option is ‘group like’ or something. Power toys are always nice, but i dont like things layering over windows, i awlays know it is there, thinking it will affect performance

I don’t think TweakUI is a layer over Windows, I think it just allows you to access system variables that you couldn’t access through a GUI.

Read full topic

item.title: Alt-Tab Replacement (and other microsoft power toys (thier name not mine))
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

xxlegitxx:

They actually are pretty useful. TweakUI is awesome. I hate the gay grouping function in XP… I’d rather have 50 documents in my taskbar than a group.

you can change that in taskbar properties. Im pretty sure the option is ‘group like’ or something. Power toys are always nice, but i dont like things layering over windows, i awlays know it is there, thinking it will affect performance

Read full topic
